# Google Translate API

### Example:

- Promise

  ```
  var TranslateAPI = require("@kaysilvn/google-translate-api");
  var Translate = new Translate().translate;

  Translate("Xin chào", { src_lang: "vi", tar_lang: "en" }).then(text => {
    console.log(text); // Hello
  }).catch(err => {
    console.log(err)
  });
  ```

- Callback

  ```
  var TranslateAPI = require("@kaysilvn/google-translate-api");
  var Translate = new Translate().translate;

  Translate("Xin chào", { src_lang: "vi", tar_lang: "en" }, (err, text) => {
    if (err) console.log(err);
    console.log(text) // Hello
  });
  ```
